channel.title: Skill help
channel.description:
Hi, I am currently trying to make my own skill (i am not releasing the name quite yet) but what i want to do is make it so that if you used 2 items together it would deleate them and send a message. Here is an example.
I used a pelstal and morter with a rune med helm, then it deleated the two and sends the message "Ha ha, thats what you get for trying to destroy that helm!"
Could someon please post the code.

item.title: Skill help
item.dc:creator: @MisterZ MisterZ
item.description:
@MisterZ wrote:

Add this in case 53: somewhere.

else if(itemused == 233 && useWith == 1147) { deleteItem(1147, getItemSlot(1147), 1); sendMessage("Ha ha, that's what you get for trying to destroy that helm!") }

Should work depending on your source…

Read full topic
